general.gigTitle: design or develop your webflow website, figma to webflow

sellerCard.description:
I am a professional UI & UX Designer. 
I have a team with 10+ people. 
We love to do Web and Mobile Design. I have more than 10+ years of experience in this field. I worked with StatenWeb ( NewYork), VoidCoders (Dhaka) and many other companies around the world. I am new here but I am always dedicated to giving you the best service. Feel free to contact me. I am always here for you.

description.content:
I'M A WEBFLOW OFFICIAL CERTIFIED EXPERT.


Get in touch with me, and we can discuss special pricing.


Welcome to my gig !


Let's create a professional, stunning, and modern Webflow website for your business.

With more than 4 years of expertise in Webflow and being a certified expert, you can trust me with your project.


Now, as a full-time freelancer on Fiverr, I'm here to offer you high-quality UI & UX design services tailored to your specific needs.


What I offer:


  1. Fully responsive Webflow website tailored to your needs
  2. Unlimited design and layout revisions until you're fully satisfied
  3. SEO-friendly URL structure
  4. Special focus on UI/UX design
  5. Visually appealing graphical layout
  6. Enhanced security with image optimization
  7. Fully functional CMS
  8. Social media integration
  9. Advanced Webflow animations
  10. Multi-language support


How I work:


Exploration:

During this phase, we analyze your competitors and industry to ensure we create a unique website tailored specifically to your audience.


Development:

We begin developing your web-site on Webflow during this phase.


Launch:

This phase we will check web-site details, fixing errors, v

slide.name: design or develop your webflow website, figma to webflow
design or develop your webflow website, figma to webflow
design or develop your webflow website, figma to webflow

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide to start working with you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In order to get started with the our project, I will need your: business information, content, plus any relevant files (documents, website references, and branding visual elements).

questionsAndAnswers.question: How many revisions do you offer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I offer 2-5 big revisions for my packages, unlimited small revisions within the order timeframe. If you need more after the order timeframe I can send an extension with an overtime fee. Will send over an extension on me if first draft doesn't leave much days for revisions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can we negotiate on prices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! Please inbox me and feel free to negotiate on prices & work if there is budget issue. I would love to help you in this regard. Thank you

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be responsive across all devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! It will be responsive across all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Where will you build the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will build your Webflow website in your Webflow account.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are you provide domain hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I am sorry, I don't offer domain and hosting. You need to purchase them but I will guide you to purchase them perfectly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you write content for my website and landing page?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can write content for your website but it's an extra service. I will charge extra fees for this service.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have a portfolio?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Please message me to see my latest works.

packageList.title: Standard Website
packageList.description: I'll design or redesign up to 3 Pages.

packageList.title: Business Website
packageList.description: I'll design and develop a 7 Page webflow business website

openGraph.title: design or develop your webflow website, figma to webflow

reviews.comment: Amazing experience working with this Figma designer! They brought our brand vision to life with custom module designs that perfectly align with our aesthetic. Their attention to detail, creativity, and ability to interpret our brief were exceptional. Communication was good, and they delivered everything on time (even ahead of schedule!). Highly recommend. Will definitely collaborate again in the future!

seller_response.comment: Great Experience. Thank you very much

reviews.comment: Delivered a fantastic website design with exceptional professionalism and meticulous attention to detail. The communication and speedy delivery was really impressive. THANK YOU so much for a brilliant job! 👏
Great design and website created for my business!
Amazing work, he did a fantastic job!
Very good work, just perfect. i would 100% choose to work with him. He will deliver what you need!

consultationData.description:
I will help you to find our your website or app issues and I will suggest you the solutions.
Each solution I will list in a PDF and in Final delivery I will give you the PDF file.
